"@Number1pegasus":/dis/the-time-wasting-thread/post/55658ebc6368727d501d0300#post_55658ebc6368727d501d0300
Basically, The anon suggested that the goal would be to finish off the enemies as creativly, Fast, or stylishly as possible. (And you would lose if important characters died or something, If time runs out, Or if Saitama gets bored and just goes home)

And the bosses would be QTEs. (And missing them would have no real consequence.)

Dude: There are 20 letters in the English alphabet.
Dudette: Nu uh, there are 26.
Dude: You're right. I forgot about U, R, A, Q, T.
Dudette: That's sweet but you forgot letter D.
Dude: Don't worry, you'll get the D later on.

Note: Do not do this in real life.

topics.body:
My brain just made an idea I regretted.

A game where you control a wad of poop with a cute face and tiny stickman arms and legs. The poop can change shape and different shapes have different abilities and weaknesses. And you have to navigate through a sewer to get to the waste management facility.

(Note: DO NOT FUCKING MAKE THIS GAME. I WILL REGRET IT FOR THE REST OF MY LIFE.)
